articles.title: How Ravi Shastri convinced team management not to unleash Jasprit Bumrah on Indian pitches in Test cricket - India Today
articles.description: India head coach Ravi Shastri revealed how he insisted captain Virat Kohli and selectors not to use Jasprit Bumrah on Indian pitches in Test cricket. Bumrah made his Test debut against South Africa in Cape Town in 2018.
